Name: Amethlion
About the game: Explore, craft and survive as you discover ancient secrets in this open world, action packed RPG adventure! An accidental discovery will leave you searching for clues, exploring forgotten places and unravelling the mysteries of a lost race all while fighting to survive. - An entire world to explore! - 50 Enemy types to beat - Over 100 unique quests to complete - 300 items to craft - Randomly generated dungeons - Pets and player housing - 60 resources to gather with skills to level up - Unique abilities to unlock - Survival mode - Unique soundtrack
Meta Title: Amethlion: Aug 27, 2018, Dynamic zero and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Amethlion? Check out the release date (Aug 27, 2018), developer insights from Dynamic zero, and a complete game summary.
